Mastering Advanced Mobile Software Full Course

Join Tetra Solutions to craft a brighter future for yourself.

Basic Details

2nd batch 2:30 to 4:30

Course Content

Android Training Modules

Learn techniques to troubleshoot and rectify signal-related issues on Android devices.

Understand the CPU architecture and its role in mobile devices for effective troubleshooting.

Master the art of updating Android versions while ensuring data integrity.

Unlock Android devices for use across different countries while maintaining functionality.

Learn techniques to troubleshoot and rectify signal-related issues on Android devices.

Acquire skills to revive Android devices from a dead boot state.

Explore methods to safely downgrade Android versions when necessary.

Gain expertise in identifying and resolving various software errors on Android devices.

Understand advanced techniques using test points for troubleshooting and repair.

Learn data recovery strategies for Android devices, ensuring minimal data loss.

Master methods to unlock devices without compromising user data.

Cover a wide range of Android models and their specific troubleshooting techniques.

Dive deep into baseband-related troubleshooting on Android devices.

Explore solutions to resolve devices stuck on logo screens without data loss.

Learn how to remove Samsung accounts from devices professionally.

Understand the process of removing Gmail accounts from Android devices.

Master techniques for creating backups and restoring data effectively.

Gain in-depth knowledge of EMMC components and their troubleshooting.

Comprehensive training on using the UMT Pro tool for Android devices.

Expert guidance on utilizing the MRT tool for advanced troubleshooting.

Learn the latest features of the CM2 tool for efficient device management.

Dive into advanced features of the Hydra tool for mobile device repair.

Master the Chimera tool for various device-related tasks.

Understand the capabilities of the Odin tool for Samsung devices.

Learn to use the SP Flash Tool for flashing firmware on Android devices.

Explore various free tools available for GSM laboratory tasks.

Gain in-depth knowledge of rooting techniques and their implications.

Understand how to resolve "Contact Service" errors on Android devices.

Learn to troubleshoot and fix no signal issues on Android devices.

Dive deep into CPU-related troubleshooting on various mobile models.

Explore how to create and utilize mobile-friendly websites effectively.

Stay updated with the latest features of the Z3X Pro tool for Android devices.

Master techniques to resolve various display-related issues on Android devices.

iOS Training Modules

Understand the process of jailbreaking iPhones for enhanced customization.

Gain expertise in troubleshooting iOS software-related issues.

Learn to manage and troubleshoot devices locked by Mobile Device Management.

Master techniques to remove MDM locks from iOS devices.

Acquire skills to revive iPhones from dead mode states.

Explore solutions for overheating and logo-stuck issues on iPhones.

Learn strategies to save and preserve data during iOS troubleshooting.

Gain a comprehensive understanding of iOS devices and their troubleshooting.

Master techniques to generate signals on iPhones for testing and troubleshooting.

Explore methods to fix software issues without physically opening iPhones.

Understand the latest software components for iOS devices.

Explore various types of websites and their applications in the iOS ecosystem.

Cover a wide range of iOS models and their specific troubleshooting techniques.

At Tetra Solutions, we are committed to providing hands-on, advanced-level training in Android and iOS mobile device management. Our modules cover a diverse range of topics, ensuring that participants gain a deep understanding of software and hardware troubleshooting techniques. Whether you're a professional seeking to enhance your skills or an enthusiast passionate about mobile devices, our training will empower you to excel in the field. Join us today and embark on a journey of expertise and success in the world of mobile technology.
